claim: on july 14 1979 at vfl park , the away team geelong score 11.12 (78)

11. If a match is found, proceed to the next steps.
12. Identify the date mentioned in the table corresponding to the matched row.
13. Check if the identified date matches the date mentioned in the claim (July 14, 1979).
14. If there's no match, the claim is FALSE.
15. If a match is found, conclude that the claim is TRUE.
